segments.text: I'm really concerned about what's happening here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is so high up on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over backward at any second, and he could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is covered in water from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could easily slip on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, engrossed in her dishwashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't see the danger brewing just a few feet behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the crash that's surely coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the broken dishes and potential injuries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face is so innocent, yet she's part of this risky game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I'm just an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation makes me genuinely anxious for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
